title: Savannah James Tapped Howard University to Test Her New Skin-Care Brand's Inclusivity
description: Joining the ever-growing ranks of celebrity beauty ventures, Savannah James (wife of LeBron) is stepping into the skin-care world with Reframe, a "clinical" skin-care brand offering dermatologist-tested formulas crafted with all skin tones in mind. With an emphasis on science-backed formulas, ...Continue reading
author: Catie Pusateri
